title: Sergeant (Shayzien)

properties.value: Sergeant are elite versions of the soldiers and found in the Shayzien Encampment. They wield a dragon longsword along with a dragon sq shield, and wear Shayzien armour.

Sergeant are elite versions of the soldiers and found in the Shayzien Encampment. They wield a dragon longsword along with a dragon sq shield, and wear Shayzien armour.
